# Welcome to DIY Fieldwork [Under construction] {.unnumbered}

This site introduces hands-on hydrology experiments designed for field-based learning. It presents the material that is used in a course at [University of Bern] http://www.geography.unibe.ch/forschung/hydrologie with the same name. The authors are:
Ueli Ammann, University of Bern, ueli.ammann  unibe.ch
Bettina Schaefli, University of Bern, bettina.schaefli unibe.ch
Natalie Ceperley, University of Bern, natalie ceperley unibe.ch

Use the navigation pane to explore each experiment.

[Please report any questions/bugs to](https://github.com/hydro-unibern/DIY-fieldwork/issues)
